articles.author: Steve Dent
articles.title: Apple offers $30 million to settle off-the-clock bag search controversy
articles.description: Last year, California's supreme court ruled that Apple broke the law by failing to pay employees while the waited for mandatory bag and iPhone searches, Apple Insider has reported. Now, Apple has offered to pay $30 million to settle the suit
